subject: Climate & Environment
title: The Three Levels of Biodiversity
description: A fast breakdown of The Three Levels of Biodiversity for builders.

hook.text: Biodiversity isn't just about species. It operates on three levels most people never think about.

buildup.text: Genetic diversity gives species variation to adapt. It's why no two tigers look identical.

discovery.text: Species diversity counts how many different species share a habitat.

twist.text: Ecosystem diversity tracks the variety of habitats â€” forests, reefs, deserts, wetlands.

climax.text: Lose any one level and the other two start to crumble. They depend on each other.

punchline.text: Biodiversity is a three-legged stool. Kick one leg and it falls.

quiz.question: What are the three levels of biodiversity?
